author: Matt Dixon
title: Florida demands quarantine for air passengers from New York, New Jersey, Connecticut
description: DeSantis says visitors are undermining state efforts to mitigate coronavirus.
content:
A Delta Air Lines plane | Getty Images
TALLAHASSEE, Fla. Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis will subject passengers on flights from New York, New Jersey and Connecticut to to mandatory isolation for two weeks after efforts to curb gatherings in those states prompted … [+5335 chars]
